section.title: The ExtJS ux classes
section.para: One thing that is missing from ExtJS 3.x is the StatusBar component. It is not missing completely, though but has been made a ux class, i.e. Ext.ux.StatusBar instead of Ext.StatusBar. Since the ux folder of the ExtJS 3.x distribution contains a whole bouquet of useful extensions, it comes with the package.

section.title: The extra theme
section.para: Since ExtJS 3.0.0 no longer comes with the gray and vista themes, but the blue one looks just to, well, blue, we decided to package a 3.x compatible gray theme, named "gray-extend". It is the work of Jos√© Alfonso Dacosta and has been released under the GNU GPL v3.
